title: An Act promoting equality and respect in the legislature

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Rausch, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 2204) of Rebecca L. Rausch for legislation to promote equality and respect in the legislature.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight
